dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so we've got some interesting updates from the space world, and specifically, from Jeff Bezos.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so we've got some interesting updates from the space world, and specifically, from Jeff Bezos.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Bezos? What's he up to now? I feel like his fashion choices are always, like, a topic of conversation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Bezos? What's he up to now? I feel like his fashion choices are always, like, a topic of conversation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You know it! He was recently spotted, um, dressed less like the richest man in the world and more like a Texas Ranger. Full camo parka, cowboy hat, aviators...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know it! He was recently spotted, um, dressed less like the richest man in the world and more like a Texas Ranger. Full camo parka, cowboy hat, aviators...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dressed in a camo parka, cowboy hat and aviators, Bezos looked less like the richest man in the world (now worth $109 billion) and more like a Texas ranger.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Wait, a cowboy hat? Seriously? That's, uh, quite a look for a tech billionaire.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, a cowboy hat? Seriously? That's, uh, quite a look for a tech billionaire.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But he was walking towards his Blue Origin New Shepard rocket, presumably at their launch site in West Texas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But he was walking towards his Blue Origin New Shepard rocket, presumably at their launch site in West Texas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The video shows him walking towards a reusable Blue Origin rocket called New Shepard, presumably at the companys launch site in West Texas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ah, okay. So, a new mission then. Has that thing, like, actually flown successfully a bunch of times now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, okay. So, a new mission then. Has that thing, like, actually flown successfully a bunch of times now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, actually! This latest mission makes it six times it's flown to space and back. Pretty big milestone for them, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, actually! This latest mission makes it six times it's flown to space and back. Pretty big milestone for them, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: [T]his vehicle has now flown to space & back six times making this a new milestone, Bezos tweeted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, six times! That's, um, really impressive for a reusable rocket. Were there any people on board this time?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, six times! That's, um, really impressive for a reusable rocket. Were there any people on board this time?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope, no humans this trip. But they did carry something really cool: thousands of postcards written by kids!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope, no humans this trip. But they did carry something really cool: thousands of postcards written by kids!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While there were no humans onboard on its most recent mission, the rocket did carry thousands of postcards that children had written as part of the Space Mail campaign from Club For The Future, a nonprofit funded by Blue Origin.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Postcards? Seriously? That's actually delightful! Is that part of that Club For The Future thing they do?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Postcards? Seriously? That's actually delightful! Is that part of that Club For The Future thing they do?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! It's their "Space Mail" campaign. The idea is to, like, give kids access to space and foster a future generation of explorers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! It's their Space Mail campaign. The idea is to, like, give kids access to space and foster a future generation of explorers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The organization is open to students, parents and teachers, with a mission to give children affordable, frequent and reliable access to space in order to foster a future generation of space explorers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, kids write a postcard, it goes to space, and then it comes back with, um, a Blue Origin stamp? That's genius.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, kids write a postcard, it goes to space, and then it comes back with, um, a Blue Origin stamp? That's genius.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The postcards will be sent back to the children after their voyage to spacewith a Blue Origin stamp newly affixed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and Bezos himself was actually shown stamping a few of them in the video. He even said, "Alright, that's a success guys. That's beautiful."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Bezos himself was actually shown stamping a few of them in the video. He even said, Alright, that's a success guys. That's beautiful.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bezos is shown stamping a few of the postcards in the video. Alright, thats a success guys. Thats beautiful, Bezos says in the video.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Aww, that's kinda sweet, actually. So, is this all still leading up to, like, actual human spaceflight for Blue Origin?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Aww, that's kinda sweet, actually. So, is this all still leading up to, like, actual human spaceflight for Blue Origin?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. This mission was another big step towards verifying New Shepard for human flights, just making it, you know, even safer and more reliable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. This mission was another big step towards verifying New Shepard for human flights, just making it, you know, even safer and more reliable.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This mission was another step towards verifying New Shepard for human spaceflight as we continue to mature the safety and reliability of the vehicle, the company said in a statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. So, a step closer to space tourism, maybe even beyond.
